mapper.select: SELECT COMMENT_NO AS commentNo, COMMENT_CONTENT AS commentContent, COMMENT_STATE AS commentState, COMMENT_RDATE AS commentRdate, DATE_FORMAT(COMMENT_RDATE, '%Y.%m.%d') AS formattedCommentRdate, u.USER_ID AS userId, BOOK_NO AS bookNo, isbn FROM COMMENT c INNER JOIN USER u ON c.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE c.COMMENT_STATE != 2 AND c.isbn = #{isbn} ORDER BY COMMENT_NO DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{perPage}
